contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox person | birth_name = Adam Matthew Lamberg | birth_date = {{birth date and age|1984|09|14|mf=yes}} | birth_place = [[New York City]], U.S. | years_active = 1996–2008 | occupation = Actor }} '''Adam Matthew Lamberg''' (born September 14, 1984) is an [[United States|American]] [[actor]], perhaps best known for his portrayal of [[David "Gordo" Gordon]] in the [[Disney Channel]] series ''[[Lizzie McGuire]]'' from 2001 through 2004. Lamberg was born in [[New York City]], the son of Suzanne, a public [[high school]] teacher, and Marc Lamberg.<ref name="jvibe">{{cite web|url = http://www.jvibe.com/pop_culture/adamlamberg.php|title = From Disney to Indie|accessdate = 2007-08-27|last = Jones|first = Jen|work = [[JVibe]]|publisher = Jewish Family & Life!}}</ref> His father is [[Jew]]ish and his mother is [[French Canadian]]; Lamberg considers himself to be a "cultural Jew."<ref name="jvibe"/> ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Title !! Role !! Notes |- | rowspan="3"| 1996 || ''[[Radiant City (1996 movie)|Radiant City]]'' || Stewie Goodman || Main Role |- | ''Dead Man's Walk'' || Willy Carey || TV mini-series |- | ''[[I'm Not Rappaport]]'' || Spiderman Kid || appearances |- | 1998|| ''[[The Day Lincoln Was Shot (TV film, 1998)|The Day Lincoln Was Shot]]'' || [[Tad Lincoln|Thomas "Tad" Lincoln]] || made for television ([[Turner Network Television|TNT]]) |- | rowspan="3"| 2001 || ''[[The Pirates of Central Park]]'' || Mike Bromback || Extra Role |- | ''Lonesome''<ref>[http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0226981/ Lonesome (2001)]</ref> || Jason Randolph || Main Role |- | ''[[Max Keeble's Big Move]]'' || Eighth Grader #3 on Bike || appearances |- | 2001–04||''[[Lizzie McGuire]]'' || David "Gordo" Gordon || Main Role; [[Disney Channel Original Series]] |- | 2003||''[[The Lizzie McGuire Movie]]'' || David "Gordo" Gordon || Main Role; [[Disney Channel Original Movie]] |- | 2005||''[[When Do We Eat? (2006 film)|When Do We Eat?]]'' || Lionel || Main Role |- | 2008||''[[Beautiful Loser (film)|Beautiful Loser]]'' || Reggie (youth) || Main Role |} ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== {{Portal|Biography}} * {{IMDb name|483047}} {{Authority control|VIAF=29230865}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Lamberg, Adam | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = American actor | DATE OF BIRTH =September 14, 1984 | PLACE OF BIRTH =[[New York City]], [[New York]], [[United States|U.S.]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Lamberg, Adam}} [[Category:1984 births]] [[Category:20th-century American actors]] [[Category:21st-century American actors]] [[Category:Actors from New York City]] [[Category:American child actors]] [[Category:American Jews]] [[Category:American male film actors]] [[Category:American male television actors]] [[Category:American people of French-Canadian descent]] [[Category:Jewish American actors]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:University of California, Berkeley alumni]]
